doc:
Gidget Gein https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gidget_Gein 0 Bradley Mark "Brad" Stewart (September 11, 1969 – October 8, 2008), known by his stage name Gidget Gein, was an American musician and artist. He was the second bassist and co-founder of the alternative metal band Marilyn Manson. His stage name references and dichotomies serial killer Ed Gein and the fictional 1960s surfer girl Gidget. Bradley_Mark_"_Brad_"_Stewart ( September_11_,_1969 – October_8_,_2008 ) , known by his_stage_name_Gidget_Gein , was an_American_musician_and_artist . He was the_second_bassist_and_co-founder of the_alternative_metal_band_Marilyn_Manson . His_stage_name_references_and_dichotomies_serial_killer_Ed_Gein and the_fictional_1960s_surfer_girl_Gidget .
